metadata.name: Ma rue paisible
metadata.description:
My panda, is not like all the other pandas.
I didn’t buy him,
I didn't receive him as a gift,
He came into my shop through the window,
And he stayed.

He follows me everywhere.
In the garden. In the street. At the baker's.
He walks beside me on the sidewalk and waits for me to cross.
He likes to help me in my shop which is in a quiet street.

He lets a beautiful cat come into our garden,
And they both sleep side by side in the sun on the windowsill.

My panda is not a panda. 
He is my friend.

The power of peacefulness is the expression of a feeling of calm and inner security. This street is soothing to me and to everyone who passes by. 
The sounds of cooking and steaming as well as the gentle wind that blows during this evening,
is « Ma rue paisible ».


Edition 1/1
2022
Animation with music and sound.
